name: Line1b_GivenName
human_label: What is your first name?
human_description: Provide your legal first name as it appears on your official documents.

name: Line1c_MiddleName
human_label: What is your middle name?
human_description: Provide your legal middle name as it appears on your official documents. If you do not have a middle name, leave this field blank.

name: Line1a_FamilyName
human_label: What is your last name?
human_description: Provide your legal last name (surname) as it appears on your official documents.

human_label: What is your first name?

name: Line3c_MiddleName

human_label: What is your last name?
human_description: Provide your legal last name (surname) as it appears on your official documents.

name: Line2b_GivenName[0]
human_label: What is your first name?
human_description: Provide your legal first name as it appears on your official documents.

name: Line2c_MiddleName[0]
human_label: What is your middle name?

name: Line2a_FamilyName[0]
human_label: What is your last name?
human_description: Provide your legal last name (surname) as it appears on your official documents.

name: USCISELISAcctNumber[0]
human_label: What is your USCIS Online Account Number?
human_description: If you have a USCIS Online Account, provide the account number. This is not the same as your A-Number.

name: Line4a_InCareofName[0]
human_label: What is the 'In Care Of' name?
human_description: If someone receives mail on your behalf at this address, provide their name here. Otherwise, leave this field blank.

name: Line4b_StreetNumberName[0]
human_label: What is your street number and name?
human_description: Provide the street number and name of your current physical address.

name: Pt2Line5_AptSteFlrNumber[0]
human_label: What is your apartment, suite, or floor number?
human_description: Provide the number of your apartment, suite, or floor, if applicable.

name: Pt2Line5_CityOrTown[0]
human_label: What is your city or town?
human_description: Provide the city or town of your current physical address.

name: Pt2Line5_State[0]
human_label: What is your state?
human_description: Provide the state of your current physical address using the two-letter abbreviation.

name: Pt2Line5_ZipCode[0]
human_label: What is your ZIP code?
human_description: Provide the ZIP code of your current physical address.

name: Line7_AlienNumber
human_label: What is your Alien Registration Number (A-Number)?
human_description: Provide your A-Number if you have one. This is a unique identification number assigned by the U.S. government.

name: Line8_ElisAccountNumber[0]
human_label: What is your USCIS Online Account Number?
human_description: If you have a USCIS Online Account, provide the account number. This is not the same as your A-Number.

name: Line12b_SSN[0]
human_label: What is your Social Security Number (SSN)?
human_description: If you have a Social Security Number, provide it here.

name: Line15b_GivenName[0]
human_label: What is your father's first name?
human_description: Provide your father's first name.

name: Line15a_FamilyName[0]
human_label: What is your father's last name?
human_description: Provide your father's last name (surname).

name: Line16b_GivenName[0]
human_label: What is your mother's first name?
human_description: Provide your mother's first name.

name: Line16a_FamilyName[0]
human_label: What is your mother's last name?
human_description: Provide your mother's last name (surname).

name: Line17a_CountryOfBirth[0]
human_label: What is your country of birth?
human_description: Provide the country where you were born.

name: Line17b_CountryOfBirth[0]
human_label: What is your country of citizenship or nationality?
human_description: Provide the country where you are currently a citizen or national.

name: Line19_DOB[0]
human_label: What is your date of birth?
human_description: Provide your date of birth in the format MM/DD/YYYY.

name: Line18a_CityTownOfBirth[0]
human_label: What is the city or town of your birth?
human_description: Provide the city or town where you were born.

name: Line18b_CityTownOfBirth[0]
human_label: What is the city or town of your citizenship or nationality?
human_description: Provide the city or town associated with your country of citizenship or nationality.

name: Line18c_CountryOfBirth[0]
human_label: What is your country of birth?
human_description: Provide the country where you were born.

name: Line20a_I94Number[0]
human_label: What is your Form I-94 Arrival-Departure Record Number?
human_description: Provide the Admission Number from your Form I-94 Arrival-Departure Record. You can find this number on your I-94 form or retrieve it from the CBP website.

name: Line20b_Passport[0]
human_label: What is your passport number?
human_description: Provide your passport number.

name: Line20c_TravelDoc[0]
human_label: What is your travel document number?
human_description: If you used a travel document other than a passport to enter the U.S., provide its number here.

name: Line20d_CountryOfIssuance[0]
human_label: What country issued your passport or travel document?
human_description: Provide the country that issued the passport or travel document you used to enter the U.S.

name: Line20e_ExpDate[0]
human_label: What is the expiration date of your passport or travel document?
human_description: Provide the expiration date of the passport or travel document you used to enter the U.S. in the format MM/DD/YYYY.

name: Line21_DateOfLastEntry[0]
human_label: What was your date of last arrival into the U.S.?
human_description: Provide the date you last entered the United States in the format MM/DD/YYYY.

name: place_entry[0]
human_label: What was the place of your last arrival into the U.S.?
human_description: Provide the city and state or port of entry where you last entered the United States.

name: Line23_StatusLastEntry[0]
human_label: What was your status at the time of your last arrival?
human_description: Provide the immigration status you had when you last entered the United States (e.g., F-1 student, B-2 visitor, Parolee).

name: Line24_CurrentStatus[0]
human_label: What is your current immigration status?
human_description: Provide your current immigration status (e.g., F-1 student, Asylum Applicant, Temporary Protected Status).

name: Line26_SEVISnumber[0]
human_label: What is your SEVIS Number?
human_description: If you are a student or exchange visitor (typically F-1 or J-1 status), provide your SEVIS (Student and Exchange Visitor Information System) number. This number is on your Form I-20 or DS-2019.

name: Line27a_Degree[0]
human_label: What is your degree?
human_description: If you are applying based on a degree, provide the name of the degree.

name: Line27b_Everify[0]
human_label: What is your employer's E-Verify name?
human_description: If your eligibility category requires it, provide your employer's name as enrolled in the E-Verify program.

name: Line27c_EverifyIDNumber[0]
human_label: What is your employer's E-Verify Identification Number or Valid E-Verify Client Company ID?
human_description: If your eligibility category requires it, provide your employer's E-Verify ID number.

name: Line28_ReceiptNumber[0]
human_label: What is the receipt number of your most recent Form I-797 Notice of Action for the underlying eligibility to file Form I-765?
human_description: If applicable, provide the receipt number from the USCIS notice related to your underlying immigration status that makes you eligible for an EAD.

name: Line30a_ReceiptNumber[0]
human_label: What is the receipt number of your most recent Form I-797 Notice of Action for the underlying eligibility to file Form I-765?
human_description: If applicable, provide the receipt number from the USCIS notice related to your underlying immigration status that makes you eligible for an EAD.

human_description: Enter the appropriate eligibility category code for your application. Refer to the form instructions for a list of categories.

name: Pt3Line2_RepresentativeName[0]
human_label: What is the name of the preparer or attorney?
human_description: If someone prepared this application for you, provide their full name or the name of the organization.

name: Pt3Line3_DaytimePhoneNumber1[0]
human_label: What is your daytime phone number?
human_description: Provide a phone number where you can be reached during the day.

name: Pt3Line4_MobileNumber1[0]
human_label: What is your mobile phone number?
human_description: Provide your mobile phone number.

name: Pt3Line5_Email[0]
